pullRequest.title: Request all job-audit data at once
pullRequest.bodyText: This is to minimize network latency and remove the odd-looking loading of one row at a time.

commit.message: Feat(Audit): Add controller to query for audit statues of multiple jobs at a time
Feat(UI): Call new endpoint to query for all job-audit data at once
Fix(Audit): Query per job rather than all at once to avoid collisions
